name: Talos
overview: Talos is a simple 2D top-down shooter game in a maze. Robot TALOS has been smashed into several pieces and scattered across big countryside. The player controls the TALOS' hand, and must find the rest of the body and regain the Crown of Eternity. The game has 200 chambers, all with enemies. The hand can shoot bolts to kill enemies, like turtles, bugs or birds. The player starts with 3 lives and can gain new levels by collecting items (and items replenish player's life bar)
